content: this granny stitch hat pattern is available in 3 sizes and is worked in the round from the top down the top uses solid stitches while the sides allow air in making it perfect for transitional weather this pattern is part of the third edition of granny square month 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements skills used basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing special stitch decrease includes written instructions and video tutorial in pattern crocheting in back loop includes link to video tutorial **skill level** easy **finished sizes** 4-6 pound preemie toddler teen/adult small *photographed sample is teen/adult small * 4-6 pound preemie 11 28 cm circumference x 5 13 cm length toddler 17 25 44 cm circumference x 7 75 19 5 cm length teen/adult small 20 5 52 cm circumference x 9 23 cm length **materials** lion brand vanna s choice yarn 100% acrylic 3 5 oz/100 g 170 yd/156 m 1 skein in 178ac sea glass *or approximately 50 yd 125 yd 170 yd /45 5 m 114 5 m 155 5 m in any medium weight yarn * us size h-8/5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle **gauge** through round 4 in pattern = 4 5 11 5 cm diameter *for best fit always check your gauge * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/01/granny-square-month-is-back/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/03/luisa-top-down-granny-stitch-hat-pattern/
